body_html:
tf.Variable(weights, trainable=False) will maintain weights unchangeable during training.
Maybe this StackOverflow answer will help.
Further info about tf.Variable class see here.

Thank you! This operation is useful to keep the declared variable keep unchanged, but I want to
keep some parameters in this variable keep unchanged, others still can be trained.

Maybe this StackOverflow answer will help.

body:
> tf.Variable(weights, trainable=False) will maintain weights unchangeable during training.
Maybe this StackOverflow answer will help.
Further info about tf.Variable class see here.

Thank you!  This operation is useful to keep the declared variable keep unchanged, but I want to 
keep some parameters in this variable keep unchanged, others still can be trained.
